name: Road Racers
description:
Road Racers is a simple racing game, similar to Rally-X. There are just two keys to use in this game and they steer left and right. There's no accelerate key and no brake key - you start moving and you keep moving. You start in a maze and the object is to steer your car around the maze collecting flags. For each flag you are awarded ten points. If you don't steer and you come to a corner then the game steers for you, there's no crashing into walls. Gameplay is really about turning when you want, not when the game makes you, well that and avoiding other cars.

There are three other cars and they start at the bottom of the maze at the same time as you. They travel at the same speed as you, they home in on you, they are very hard to avoid and crashing into them is the end.You get three lives and a bonus if you get 1000 points.

shot.caption: There's no splash screen. The game starts with the instructions and then it's straight into the game
This is where you start, you're the blue car and the chase cars are behind you. There's no way to accelerate, all cars move automatically and at the same speed
First corner and a flag appears from nowhere low on the right
This does not look good. There's no reverse so a collision is inevitable
A collision leaves a mashed up version of your car. then the game restarts at screen 2
I'm going to get a flag and score some points!
At your right the most important survival tool you'll need: the map. Without it, forget the game.
Level 2. First thing to know is what point represents your car. That's a major achievement.
Take a look at the upper icon. It's a pool of oil. It will reverse your direction.
Notice something strange? You're right, your car cannot change direction. This is the sliding effect of the pool of oil...
...which can represent an unpredictable side effect and a very unfortunate crash against the opponents.
Always eat vegetables, spinach and tomatoes. Grilled are also ok.
This is what happens when another car bumps against yours.
Who says this game doesn't have AI? The enemy cars are teamed up and can really set you up.
I don't know what to say about this one, but at the time I was capturing the snapshot, I believe I had a strong reason to pick it up.
